mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.code AS "code", a.name AS "name", a.sort AS "sort", a.pace AS "pace", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds"
LEFT JOIN sicmed_medical_class b ON b.id = a.parent_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sicmed_medical_class a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code},'%')
AND a.parent_ids LIKE CONCAT('%',#{parentIds},'%')
AND a.parent_id = #{parent.id}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.sort LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sort},'%')
AND a.pace LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pace},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sicmed_medical_class( id, code, name, sort, pace, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, parent_id, parent_ids ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{pace}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sicmed_medical_class SET id = #{id}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, pace = #{pace}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds} WHERE id = #{id}
